shadestepper.name: Shadestepper
shadestepper.description: Shadesteppers hide themselves and deal devastating damage at the right time. (Glass Cannon, Burst Damage)

trickster.name: Trickster
trickster.description: Tricksters summon clones and confuse enemies with various tricks. (CC, Tricks)

acrobat.name: Acrobat
acrobat.description: Acrobats are agile and combo-heavy fighters. (Combos, Speed)

spinattack.name: Spin Attack
description: Click Combo: RIGHT-LEFT-RIGHT
damaging enemies over a large area.
 Mana Cost: 40
 Total Damage: 150% (of your DPS)
( Damage: 120%)
( Thunder: 30%)
 Area of Effect: 4.5 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)

spinAttackCost1.name: Cheaper Spin Attack
description: Reduce the Mana cost of Spin Attack.
 Mana Cost: -10
Required Ability: Spin Attack

daggerProficiency.name: Dagger Proficiency I
description: Increases your Walk Speed and
Main Attack's damage by +5%.

doubleSpin.name: Double Spin
description: Spin Attack will activate twice, with a
larger area of effect on the second hit.
 Total Damage: -40% (of your DPS)
( Damage: -40%)
 Area of Effect: +2 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)

poisonedBlade.name: Poisoned Blade
description: For every 2% or 2 Raw Main Attack Damage you have
from items, gain +5/3s Poison Damage. (Max 50/3s)
Your Main Attack gains additional range.
 Range: +1 Block

dash.name: Dash
description: Click Combo: RIGHT-RIGHT-RIGHT
 Mana Cost: 20

doubleSlice.name: Double Slice
description: Your Main Attack will hit twice,
but deal -40% damage per hit.

smokebomb.name: Smoke Bomb
description: Click Combo: RIGHT-RIGHT-LEFT
Throws a bomb that slowly emanates smoke,
damaging all enemies in it every 0.5s.
 Mana Cost: 35
 Total Damage: 35% (of your DPS)
( Damage: 25%)
( Air: 5%)
( Earth: 5%)
 Range: 10 Blocks
 Duration: 5s
 Area of Effect: 3 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)

dashCost1.name: Cheaper Dash
description: Reduce the Mana cost of Dash.
 Mana Cost: -5

multihit.name: Multihit
description: Click Combo: RIGHT-LEFT-LEFT
Unleashes a rapid flurry of 8 hits to enemies
facing you, dealing heavy damage.
 Mana Cost: 40
 Total Damage: 40% (of your DPS, per hit)
( Damage: 30%)
( Water: 10%)
 Range: 3 Blocks (Cone-Shaped)

assassinEarthPath.name: Earth Mastery
description:  Earth Damage: +2-4
 Earth Damage: +20%

assassinThunderPath.name: Thunder Mastery
description:  Thunder Damage: +1-8
 Thunder Damage: +10%

assassinWaterPath.name: Water Mastery
description:  Water Damage: +2-4
 Water Damage: +15%

assassinAirPath.name: Air Mastery
description:  Air Damage: +3-4
 Air Damage: +15%

assassinFirePath.name: Fire Mastery
description:  Fire Damage: +3-5
 Fire Damage: +15%

backstab.name: Backstab
description: Makes Multihit a single devastating hit.
If you strike an enemy from behind, it
deals double the damage.
 Mana Cost: -5
 Total Damage: 300% (of your DPS)
( Damage: 250%)
( Earth: 50%)
Min Shadestepper Archetype: 2

fatality.name: Fatality
description: Multihit will deal an
 Total Damage: +150% (of your DPS)
( Damage: +100%)
( Air: +50%)

vanish.name: Vanish
description: Dash will hide you into the shadows. You
cannot heal or gain mana while in this state.
(Attack or get hit to cancel)
 Effect: Invisibility to Self
 Duration: 5s
 Cooldown: 5s

stickyBomb.name: Sticky Bomb
description: Smoke Bomb will stick to enemies
 Total Damage: +10% (of your DPS)
( Fire: +10%)
Required Ability: Smoke Bomb

rightingReflex.name: Righting Reflex
description: When you hold shift while airborne, slowly
glide and become immune to fall damage. (Max 5s)

fatalstrike.name: Surprise Strike
description: Your first hit after casting Vanish
will deal +80% more damage.
Min Shadestepper Archetype: 3

shadowClones.name: Mirror Image
description: Summon 3 Clones ⁂ after reappearing from
Vanish that will follow and protect you.
When hit, you take 60% less damage.
Clones ⁂ can take 2 hits before dying.
 Cooldown: 15s
Min Trickster Archetype: 2

lacerate.name: Lacerate
description: Spin Attack will lunge you forward,
deal 3 strikes and then lunge you upward.
 Total Damage: 90% (of your DPS, per strike)
( Damage: 60%)
( Air: 20%)
( Water: 10%)
Min Acrobat Archetype: 2

silentKiller.name: Silent Killer
description: Resets Vanish's cooldown

explodingClones.name: Last Laugh
description: When losing a Clone ⁂, it will
cast Spin Attack before dying.
Required Ability: Mirror Image

wallOfSmoke.name: Wall of Smoke
description: Smoke Bomb will throw +2 bombs.
 Total Damage: -10% (of your DPS)
( Damage: -10%)
Required Ability: Smoke Bomb

shenanigans.name: Shenanigans
description: For every 2% Stealing you have
from items, gain +1/3s Mana Steal. (Max 8/3s)

psithurism.name: Psithurism
description: Increase your Walk Speed by +20%
and your Jump Height by +1.

betterSmokeBomb.name: Better Smoke Bomb
description: Increase Smoke Bomb's range
 Range: +10 Blocks
 Area of Effect: +1 Block (Circle-Shaped)
Required Ability: Smoke Bomb

shadowtravel.name: Shadow Travel
description: by +120% when in Vanish.

multihitCost1.name: Cheaper Multihit
description: Reduce the Mana cost of Multihit.
 Mana Cost: -5

daggerProficiency2.name: Dagger Proficiency II
description: Increases your Main Attack's range and
increase the raw damage to all attacks.
 Damage Bonus: +5 (Raw)
 Range: +1 Block

shadowSiphon.name: Shadow Siphon
description: Reduces Vanish's cooldown by -1.75s after
striking an enemy from behind with Backstab.

bamboozle.name: Bamboozle
description: When Clones ⁂ are active, casting Multihit while
holding shift will instead slay 1 Clone ⁂ and
teleport you forwards with a brutal fiery slash.
 Total Damage: 400% (of your DPS)
( Damage: 360%)
( Fire: 40%)
 Range: 6 Blocks
 Area of Effect: 5 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
Required Ability: Mirror Image

distraction.name: Distraction
description: When hitting enemies, reduce their
damage by -0.1% per hit. (Max -15%)
The debuff decays by -0.3% per second.

smokeBombCost1.name: Cheaper Smoke Bomb
description: Reduce the Mana cost of Smoke Bomb.
 Mana Cost: -5
Required Ability: Smoke Bomb

discombobulate.name: Blazing Powder
description: Spin Attack and Lacerate will blind
enemies and deal additional damage.
 Total Damage: +20% (of your DPS)
( Fire: +20%)
 Effect: Blindness () to Enemies
 Duration: 1s

weightless.name: Weightless
description: You gain +0.6 Mana if you
hit an enemy while airborne.
Min Acrobat Archetype: 3

blackHole.name: Black Hole
description: Smoke Bomb will pull nearby enemies.
 Range: 6 Blocks

chainedHits.name: Sandbagging
description: Reduces the cooldown on all
of your abilities by -3s every
time you get hit for less than
5% of your max health.
 Cooldown: 1s

hop.name: Hop
description: Leap forwards when you double jump.
 Cooldown: 2s

flowState.name: Flow State
description: Landing 60 hits without stopping
for over 2s will greatly increase
your damage for a short time.
 Effect: +35% Damage Bonus (⚔) to Self
 Duration: 5s
 Cooldown: 10s
Min Acrobat Archetype: 5

bigHit.name: Violent Vortex
description: Dealing over 1.5x of your max health as
damage in a single hit will deal 30% of
the damage to other nearby enemies.
 Area of Effect: 10 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
 Cooldown: 2s

vulnerableBomb.name: Delirious Gas
description: While you're inside Smoke Bomb,
increase your damage by +25%
and gain Luring ❤ for 20s.
While under Luring ❤, enemies within a 16 block
radius of you will become Lured ❥, causing
them to move 15% faster and target only you.
Required Ability: Smoke Bomb
Min Trickster Archetype: 4

betterMultihit.name: Stronger Multihit
description: Increase Multihit's amount of hits by +3.

marked.name: Marked
description: Smoke Bomb will add +1 Mark ✜ to
Marked ✜ enemies will take +6% damage
from attacks for each mark they have.
Marked ✜ will decay once every 10s.
Min Shadestepper Archetype: 5

darkArts.name: Echo
description: Your Clones ⁂ will mimic your spells and
abilities, but you deal -20% damage for
Bamboozle becomes significantly stronger.
 Total Damage: +800% (of your DPS)
( Damage: +720%)
( Fire: +80%)
Required Ability: Mirror Image
Min Trickster Archetype: 6

stanceChange.name: Shurikens
description: After using Dash, your next
Main Attack will throw 3 shurikens.
 Total Damage: 120% (of your DPS, per shuriken)
( Damage: 100%)
( Fire: 20%)
 Range: 50 Blocks

rangeMultihit1.name: Far Reach
description: Increase the range of Multihit.
 Range: +2 Blocks

dashSlash.name: Dancing Blade
description: Deal damage to enemies you Dash through.
 Total Damage: 80% (of your DPS)
( Damage: 70%)
( Air: 10%)

betterFatalstrike.name: Ambush
description: Increases Surprise Strike's
damage by +40%.
Required Ability: Surprise Strike

markPulls.name: Death Magnet
description: When exiting Vanish, pull all
nearby Marked ✜ mobs towards
where you entered Vanish.
 Range: 20 Blocks

dashCost2.name: Cheaper Dash
description: Reduce the Mana cost of Dash.
 Mana Cost: -5

parry.name: Parry
description: After dodging damage with Agility,
gain a brief damage buff, and make
your next spell within 1.5s free.
 Effect: +30% Damage Bonus (⚔) to Self
 Duration: 1.5s
 Cooldown: 3s
Min Acrobat Archetype: 5

spinAttackCost2.name: Cheaper Spin Attack
description: Reduce the Mana cost of Spin Attack.
 Mana Cost: -5
Required Ability: Spin Attack

nightcloakKnives.name: Nightcloak Knife
description: If cast while in Vanish,
Spin Attack will consume all
Marks ✜ from nearby enemies to
summon the Nightcloak Knife.
The Knife will copy your
attacks on enemies near you,
dealing 8% of your damage for every
2 Marks ✜ consumed. (Max 10 Marks)
 Range: 6 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
 Duration: 40s

multihitCost2.name: Cheaper Multihit
description: Reduce the Mana cost of Multihit.
 Mana Cost: -5

infectiveblow.name: Hoodwink
description: When hitting enemies with Spin Attack, reduce
the duration of your negative effects by
30% per hit and transfer them onto enemies.
Luring ❤ can be transferred to most enemies.
(Bosses and special enemies are immune)
Required Ability: Spin Attack
Min Trickster Archetype: 1

chokebomb.name: Choke Bomb
description: Smoke Bomb will slow down
enemies while in the smoke.
 Effect: 40% Slowness () to Enemies
 Duration: 1s

walljump.name: Wall Jump
description: Reduces Hop's cooldown by
-1s. Using Hop into a wall
Min Acrobat Archetype: 5

spinAttackmarked.name: Fatal Spin
description: Increases Spin Attack and Lacerate's range
and damage, and adds +1 Mark ✜ to enemies hit.
 Total Damage: +20% (of your DPS)
( Damage: +20%)
 Area of Effect: +1 Block (Circle-Shaped)
Min Shadestepper Archetype: 8

shadowDash.name: Dissolution
description: When entering and exiting Vanish, become immune to
knockback and gain resistance for a brief moment.
 Effect: +60% Resistance Bonus (✾) to Self
 Duration: 0.5s
Min Shadestepper Archetype: 2

goombaStomp.name: Pirouette
description: When hitting an enemy with Dancing Blade,
you will deal extra damage and vault upwards,
resetting Dash as if you touched the ground.
 Total Damage: +40% (of your DPS)
( Damage: +30%)
( Air: +10%)
Required Ability: Dancing Blade

betterLacerate.name: Stronger Lacerate
description: Lacerate will deal +1 slash.

bigHit2.name: Stronger Vortex
description: Increases Violent Vortex's damage
by +40% and increases the damage
requirement to be 2.5x your max health.
Required Ability: Violent Vortex

markedMana.name: Harvester
description: After killing an enemy, gain +5 Mana
for each leftover Mark ✜ it had.

smokeBombCost2.name: Cheaper Smoke Bomb
description: Reduce the Mana cost of Smoke Bomb.
 Mana Cost: -5
Required Ability: Smoke Bomb

multiTeleportation.name: Blade Fury
description: While using Multihit on an enemy, lock
their position in front of you.
Multihit gains extra damage and
can be aimed in all directions.
 Total Damage: +15% (of your DPS, per hit)
( Thunder: +15%)

moreMarks.name: More Marks
description: Increase your maximum Marks ✜ by +2.

betterClones.name: Stronger Clones
description: Improves your damage by +5% per Clone ⁂
while your Clones ⁂ are active, and reduce
their maximum damage penalty by 5%.
Min Trickster Archetype: 7

ricochets.name: Ricochets
description: Your Shurikens will bounce 2 times
 Range: 12 Blocks
Min Acrobat Archetype: 8

shindeiru.name: Satsujin
description: If an enemy has 4+ Marks ✜, your next Multihit
or Powder Special will deal +100% damage.
 Cooldown: 15s (per enemy)
Min Shadestepper Archetype: 12

forbiddenArt.name: Forbidden Art
description: Summon +3 additional Clones ⁂, but
increase your maximum damage penalty
by -5% while Clones ⁂ are active.
 Cooldown: +15s
Required Ability: Mirror Image
Min Trickster Archetype: 8

jasminBloom.name: Jasmine Bloom
description: After spending 40 Mana, an area underneath
you blooms and damages enemies below it every 0.3s.
The duration is reset and the radius is
increased after every bloom. (Max 10 Blocks)
 Total Damage: 80% (of your DPS)
( Damage: 60%)
( Water: 15%)
( Earth: 5%)
 Duration: 5s
 Area of Effect: +2 Blocks (per bloom)
Min Acrobat Archetype: 12

diversion.name: Diversion
description: Grants allies within 16 blocks
+10% Overhealth ❤ whenever
you hit a Lured ❥ enemy.
Overhealth ❤ decays over 10s.
 Cooldown: 9s
Required Ability: Delirious Gas
Min Trickster Archetype: 12

betterWeightless.name: Better Weightless
description: Weightless will grant +0.6 more mana.

betterMarkedMana.name: Devour
description: Harvester will give +5 Mana.

markedDamage.name: Better Marked
description: Increases Marked's damage
bonus by +4%.

betterClones2.name: Even Stronger Clones
description: Reduce your maximum damage penalty
by 5% while Clones ⁂ are active.
